document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">stop </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">breaking </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">live </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">vain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">ease </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Aching </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">cool </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Pain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">help </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">fainting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Robin </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Nest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">again </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">live </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">vain. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: If I can stop one heart from breaking
